com.fortify.pub.bugtracker.plugin

Class BugTrackerPluginHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.pub.bugtracker.plugin.BugTrackerPluginHelper

  • public class BugTrackerPluginHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with utility methods that bug tracker plugins can use. Any plugin class inheriting from the out-of-the-box abstract classes provided will have a protected member instance of this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Detail

      • populateWithDefaultsIfAvailable

        public boolean populateWithDefaultsIfAvailable(java.util.List<BugTrackerConfig> configuration)
        Helper method to give a convenient way of setting default values for configuration items, such as a single company JIRA instance. This method attempts to load the properties file from the WAR under WEB-INF/classes The name of the properties file is same as the simple name of the plugin class suffixed with ".properties". The property values read from this file are set in the bug tracker config passed. The values are expected to be keyed by the configuration identifier.
        Parameters:
        configuration - bug tracker configuration on which default values are to be set
        Returns:
        true if a properties file was found and loaded successfully, false otherwise

      • findParam

        public BugParam findParam(java.lang.String paramIdentifier,
                          java.util.List<BugParam> params)
        Helper method to retrieve bug parameter with given identifier by iterating across a list of bug parameters
        Parameters:
        paramIdentifier - identifier to find
        params - list of all params
        Returns:
        null if parameter is not found, the param object if found

      • removeParam

        public boolean removeParam(java.lang.String paramIdentifier,
                           java.util.List<BugParam> params)
        Remove a parameter with the given identifier from a list of params
        Parameters:
        paramIdentifier - the param to be removed
        params - the list from which removal is to be done
        Returns:
        whether or not a param was removed

      • buildDefaultBugDescription

        public java.lang.String buildDefaultBugDescription(IssueDetail issue,
                                                   boolean includeComments)
        Builds a initial default bug description
        Parameters:
        issue - issueDetail object
        includeComments - whether or not to include comments in the bug description
        Returns:
        bug description
